Factsheet

Developer:
kohrabi
Based in Vietnam
Release date:
12 Jul, 2025
Platforms:
PC / Web
Website:
kohrabi.itch.io/fragment
Regular Price:

Description

Short Description

FRAGMENT is a "Speedrun" platformer, inspired by Titanfall 2, Celeste and Portal. You play as a weaponized human test subject disguised as a robot. Your goal is to finish all the test, destroying the heart behind your creation, is it?.

Long Description

You are a weaponized human test subject disguised as a AI Robotics product to be use for military purpose. Created by TRANSHUMAN FOUNDATION, a company conducting unethical experiment on human and AI for monetary gain. The company is allegedly ran by one person and AI, maximizing profits without any cautionary.

Features

  • RUN, THINK, SHOOT, LIVE: Grenade jump, climb, run. slide through 50 intense levels
  • DON'T LET ANYTHING STOP YOU: Designed to easily speedrun, Levels let you look cool af.
  • Minimalist Presentation, Maximum Speed: A sharp, futuristic aesthetic keeps the focus on fluid gameplay and high-speed performance
  • Accessible Play Options: You can turn off screenshake, Bloom, Distort effects in the settings.

History

Started out as a club project with blocky square graphics, the project grew and evolved over time and underwent a complete art overhaul—transforming into the pixel-art sci-fi platformer it is today. It took a year in total to learn Unity, pixel art, music production plus 7 season of Black Mirror for me to create this finished products.

Main story

Welcome. We are the TRANSHUMAN FOUNDATION. Founded to pioneer the next stage of human evolution through artificial intelligence and advanced robotics.

Today, we unveil our most ambitious creation yet: The Rab6it.

Designed for speed, resilience, and adaptability, the Rab6it is an autonomous unit capable of navigating diverse terrains, supporting frontp logistics and high-risk environments

It can travel at speeds of up to 12.36 units per second, withstand explosions, survive falls from any height, and anchor itself to walls using a high-friction climbing system. The Rab6it also features a projectile propulsion system, allowing rapid traversal through difficult terrains. Warning: Standing near its blast radius may result in severe injuries to unaugmented humans.

At the heart of the Rab6it lies our proprietary Artificial Intelligence, a central brain powering every unit simultaneously, capable of memorizing, processing, making hundreds of decisions per second, solving complex problems with a 99.9% accuracy rate - trained continuously through organic feedback simulation to evolve in real time as if it is a human.

This isn’t just artificial intelligence anymore. This is pure intelligence. This breakthrough doesn't just redefine robotics. It accelerates the entire AI industry—by at least five decades. Creating a controlled, sustainable, predictable future. Introducing... the Rab6it.
